name: Dungeon Arena (itch) (ENOOPS Games)
description:
Dungeon Arena is a retro style arena combat RPG. Choose your class and embark on an unforgettable adventure! Various locations, weapons and enemies will not let you get bored!

Take the risk to descend into the dungeon to clear the undead and bandits, or go to the hot desert teeming with enemies. Decide on your class, whether that ancient sorcerer or a proud knight armed with a sword and shield. And start preparing for battle!
